text: Which of the following are valid statements about Amazon S3? Choose 2 answers
choiceList: A. S3 provides read-after-write consistency for any type of PUT or DELETE.
B. Consistency is not guaranteed for any type of PUT or DELETE.
C. A successful response to a PUT request only occurs when a complete object is saved
D. Partially saved objects are immediately readable with a GET after an overwrite PUT.
E. S3 provides eventual consistency for overwrite PUTS and DELETES

text: A customer is leveraging Amazon Simple Storage Service in eu-west-1 to store static content for web-based property. The customer is storing objects using the Standard Storage class. Where are the customers’ objects replicated?
choiceList: A. Single facility in eu-west-1 and a single facility in eu-central-1
B. Single facility in eu-west-1 and a single facility in us-east-1
D. A single facility in eu-west-1

text: A user has an S3 object in the US Standard region with the content “color=red”. The user updates the object with the content as “color=”white”. If the user tries to read the value 1 minute after it was uploaded, what will S3 return?
choiceList: C. It will return an error saying that the object was not found
D. It may return either “color=red” or “color=white” i.e. any of the value
